newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Oriental Bank estimates raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Oriental Bank estimates raised.

text.p: -- ABN AMRO Chicago Corp said Wednesday it increased its estimate for Oriental Bank & Trust's fiscal 1997 earnings to $2.18 a share from $2.10 and its estimate for fiscal 1998 to $2.55 a share from $2.50.

-- ABN AMRO also reiterated its buy rating and increased its target price for Oriental Bank to $25. ABN AMRO cited the banking company's solid growth in earning assets and fee revenues. Oriental Bank's asset quality remains stable after it purged substandard credits in December, ABN AMRO said.
-- Oriental Bank shares were trading up 1/8 Wednesday at 21-1/8.
